Detailed Description

Class PatchSideDataOpsInteger provides a collection of operations that may be used to manipulate integer side-centered patch data. The operations include basic arithmetic, min, max, etc. With the assertion of a few basic routines, this class inherits its interface (and thus its functionality) from the base class PatchSideDataBasicOps from which it is derived.

A more extensive set of operations is implemented for real (double and float) and complex patch data in the classes PatchSideDataOpsReal and PatchSideDataOpsComplex, repsectively.

See also:
math::PatchSideDataBasicOps

int SAMRAI::math::PatchSideDataOpsInteger::numberOfEntries ( const tbox::Pointer< pdat::SideData< int > > &  data,
const hier::Box &  box 
) const

Return the number of data values for the side-centered data object in the given box. Note that it is assumed that the box refers to the cell-centered index space corresponding to the patch hierarchy.
